Third parties that advertise goods or services in our App or website may also use cookies to track your use of the Service.
Our third-party business partners may use the information either for themselves or on behalf of their own business partners to:
Provide you with advertisements and information for products and services or send you other notifications based on variables such as your location, and assess your level of engagement with them;
We may share the information we collect with third-party business partners who commit to comply with applicable laws concerning their usage of the information.
